originalText.text: I have been listening to WBLS  since I was a little girl. My Mom would play the Quiet Storm to wind my brother and I down for the night and the last thing I heard before falling asleep was Freddie Crocker's smooth voice signing off of the air and "Moody'd Mood for Love playing. I am currently at work, it's Saturday, July, 9th, 12:45 pm and  the DJ has just finished playing 50 Cent's "In The Club." I am quite surprised that a clean version of this song wasn't played. I don't know if your ratings are down and you're trying to target a new or specific audience but if things of this nature continue I will be changing radio stations. I listen to WBLS because it's a mature station that plays "grown up" music. i expect more from you.
